title: About me
text:
I was born and raised in Orem, UT all my life.



Since beginning college in the fall of 2019 I have lived in Pennsylvania, Maryland, Delaware, New Jersey, Virginia, South Dakota, and Idaho.
I’ve also traveled abroad to Mexico, Honduras, Belize, Puerto Rico, London, France, Switzerland, Italy, Austria, Lichtenstein, and Germany.


Since traveling, and through simple personal growth, I’ve come to see the world as far more makeshift and maleable in the hands of those who learn to shape it. The skills incorporated by data scientists, computer scientists, and business analysis—all of which I am—endeavor to create and protect a better world.

title: Andrew Seaman’s CV
text:
Business Analyst | Computer Scientist | Data Scientist | Public Speaker


LinkedIn Phone Email

title: Andrew Seaman’s CV
text:
Currently
On-campus student of Brigham Young University - Idaho dedicated to studying, diligence, and hard work. Intrinsically motivated towards excellence in menial and major tasks desiring personal success for public gain. Creativity, discovery, and personal interest drive a habit of learning at all times in a varied field of interests.
Personal passions include music, sports, computer science, and other areas of interest.
Pursuing a Bachelors of Science, Business Analytics and a Minor, Computer Science.
Expected graduation: Fall 2026.

Specialized in




Topics






• Business Analytics • Data Science • Computer Science






Programming Languages






• Python • C# • MySQL • R • Markdown (Quarto)






Technologies






• Excel • Google Sheets






Soft Skills






• Public Speaking • Spanish Fluency• Writing • Organization• Teamwork• Conflict Resolution







Research interests

Machine learning
Data structures
Advanced data modeling and predictive analysis for business efficiency

title: Andrew Seaman’s CV
text:
Education




Brigham Young University - Idaho


Idaho, Rexburg




Bachelors of Science, Business Analytics


Fall 2019 - Present




Minor, Computer Science






• Junior, On-Campus student • Sales Society, Men’s Choir, Beginning Orchestra










Orem High School


Utah, Orem




High School Diploma


Sep 2016 - May 2019




• GPA: 3.97, Graduated with Honors • National Honors Society (2015-2019)






• Cross Country Team, Club Soccer• Advanced Choir, Drama• Spanish, French, AP and Honors Classes.

title: Andrew Seaman’s CV
text:
Work Experience




Vantage Marketing


South Dakota & Illinois




Sales account manager & Recruiter


Nov 2023 - Present




• Engaged in active recruitment. • Performing door-to-door sales for Insight Pest Control. • Team historically produces 2.5 million in serviced revenue.










Greenix Pest Control


Delaware & Pennsylvania




Sales account manager


Jul 2023 - Aug 2023




• Executed door-to-door sales. • Team collectively produced 1.2 million in serviced revenue.










Pointe Marketing


Maryland & Virginia




Sales account manager


Mar 2023 - Jul 2023




• Executed door-to-door sales for Frontline Pest Control. • Team collectively produced 1.8 million in serviced revenue.










Malawi’s Pizza


Orem, UT




Dishwasher, Busser, Line Cook, Cashier


Jun 2015 - Oct 2017




• Cleaned dishes in a high paced environment. • Made food in several stations (pizza, pasta, salad). • Trained in cashiering.










The Bella Bazar


Lehi, UT




Executive Assistant


Jan 2015 - Dec 2016




• Streamlined setup processes • Improved customer service standards• Ensured proper food handling• Upheld sanitation protocols.

title: Andrew Seaman’s CV
text:
Service




Pennsylvania Philadelphia Mission




Sep 2020 - Oct 2022




The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints






Volunteer Minister - Spanish Speaking






• Commissioned by the President of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints. Relocated frequently to serve communities and primarily engage in proselytizing for a two-year period.






• Directed by President Daniel F. Dunnigan, and President Justin Harding, formerly Chief of Staff to Utah Governor Gary Herbert.










Yucatan, Mexico




Jul 2018




Humanitarian Especially for Youth






Volunteer Builder - Spanish Speaking






• Played a key role in construction of a school’s foundation alongside local workers for young and abused girls reclaimed from abusive families for protection and success.










Orem, UT




Jan 2012 - Dec 2018




The Boy Scouts of America (BSA)






Eagle Scout






• Achieved esteemed rank of Eagle Scout after 7 years (December 2018). Earned merit badges through skill development and community engagement. These experiences contributed to enrichment as a citizen.

title: Andrew Seaman’s CV
text:
Extra Curricular




Orem, UT & Rexburg, ID




Sep 2013 - Apr 2020




Choral Artist






Tennor Vocalist






• Involved in 6 choirs; Institutions (3): Canyon View Jr. High School, Orem High School, Brigham Young University - Idaho.










UT & European Nations




Sep 2018 - Jul 2019




The Utah Ambassadors of Music






European Choir Tour Nominee & Participant






• Selected as a three-times nominee for The Utah Ambassadors of Music.






• Nominated by Sterling Keys, High School choir director, for participation in bi-annual European Choir Tour (2019).






• Concert host countries include: London, France, Switzerland, Austria, Italy, and Germany.

text: I was born and raised in Orem, UT all my life.

title: About me
text:
Since beginning college in the fall of 2019 I have lived in Pennsylvania, Maryland, Delaware, New Jersey, Virginia, South Dakota, and Idaho.
I’ve also traveled abroad to Mexico, Honduras, Belize, Puerto Rico, London, France, Switzerland, Italy, Austria, Lichtenstein, and Germany.


Since traveling, and through simple personal growth, I’ve come to see the world as far more makeshift and maleable in the hands of those who learn to shape it. The skills incorporated by data scientists, computer scientists, and business analysis—all of which I am—endeavor to create and protect a better world.
